summary: A broken-hearted hit man moves to the desert where he finds skilled swordsmen to carry out his contract killings.
cast: Brigitte Lin|Leslie Cheung|Maggie Cheung|Tony Chiu-Wai Leung|Jacky Cheung|Tony Ka Fai Leung|Li Bai|Carina Lau|Charlie Yeung|Joey Wang|Shun Lau|Li Yin
title: Este contraveneno del Oeste
